item.title: Trump announces 100% tariff on Chinese imports, after stock market sell-off
item.description: China imposed limits on rare earth minerals a day earlier.

item.title: Marine Corps veteran accused of planning shootings at Texas school, zoo: Police
item.description: A Marine Corps veteran had his bail raised to $10 billion after he allegedly threatened to shoot up a Texas school and zoo on Thursday and led cops on...

item.title: Government shutdown updates: OMB's Vought says mass firings 'have begun'
item.description: Russ Vought said in a social media post that the administration is making good on their threat of mass firings of the federal workforce.

item.title: WATCH: Beloved March Madness icon Sister Jean dies at 106

item.title: WATCH: President Trump signs proclamation protecting Columbus Day name
item.description: President Trump signed a proclamation protecting the name Columbus Day before hosting a Cabinet meeting on Thursday.
